data.name: Tirsy's Tale
data.detailed_description:
The Age of Dragons is ending, and the time of humanity begins its ascent as the last of the dragonkin take their great journey to a sacred resting place known as the Land Beyond. Reqweki quakes with the movement of these majestic creatures leaving vast changes throughout the world. Join young Tirsy as she traverses the world to reach the Land Beyond. Meet companions along the way who can assist in various ways by utilizing the power of the Dragonheart. Uncover the secrets of the Drahkin and their rise by use of the Dragonheart Magic, and find a way to reach the great Land Beyond!


  • Complete over 15 full levels!

    Explore several levels each with their own challenge and obstacles that also tell a story of what has happened in that area. From forests to canyons to swamps and even the sea itself, discover the path of your choosing as you work your way to the Land Beyond. The beauty of Reqweki is vast and breathtaking! Can you piece together the hidden secrets of what has happened?

  • A unique Protagonist is born!

    Play as a young dragon named Tirsy as she learns from the very beginning how to be a dragon! From baby steps to gliding through the air, you will experience this little dragon's journey as she discovers what she is capable of and why she was all alone upon hatching.

  • Friends for the Friendly!

    Meet fun and unique companions in the form of other dragons to assist you throughout your journey. Fulfill tasks from these companions to further progress their personalized stories and discover why they too are on a journey to reach the Land Beyond. Uncover the secrets of the Dragonheart and harness the elements from your companions to overcome the obstacles before you!

  • Trouble brews in the Shadows!

    Obstacles stand in your way throughout the world, some from nature, some from the troublesome trio of dragons who seemingly live to hinder your progress along the way. Meet Smoulder, a dark scaled dragon from the Voidling Herd, as he begins to cause chaos to make things more difficult for you and your companions!

  • Shinies for the Collectors!

    Collect artifacts along your journey and hoard them into your collection upon reaching the Land Beyond! With over 30 collectibles hidden throughout the world, only those who seek to explore will discover them all!

  • Unique randomly generated paths and obstacles to overcome.

    Each journey of young Tirsy and friends will be unique, with branching paths based on your decisions and randomly generated obstacles to change the course of a level. This allows for a unique experience each time you play through the game as no two journeys will be exactly the same. The underlining story changes based on your decisions and the path you have to take to progress forward.

  • Simple but fun combat!

    Fight the wildlife as it tries to stop you from reaching your goals! Learn to harness the elements to become capable of overcoming all odds in this fun simplistic combat system. Or just become that which tries to hinder you, and cause chaos to passive wildlife you come across. The choice is yours!

  • The history is hidden beneath the surface!

    Discover the hidden lore and what is really going on behind the surface of the world of Reqweki. Complete great puzzles, each unique in their own way, and find bits and pieces to explain how the world looks the way it does and what exactly are the Drahkin. Find the truth about the whereabouts of Tirsy's mother and how she came to be born an orphan. Find ruined areas and caves full of strange nature and why they have been warped so.

  • Experience a 3D Puzzle Platforming Adventure RPG, all in one unique adventure!

    From platforming to puzzles to simple combat, flight, and swimming, you can experience everything as a young dragon filled with adventure! Quest your way to victory as you help others around you and learn about the secrets of the world as you do! Reqweki is a mysterious place full of many things, and you can discover all of them!

data.short_description: As the Age of Dragons comes near an end, join young Tirsy on a great journey to the Land Beyond. Traverse vast locations full of challenges from hostile creatures to nature itself. Meet companions along the way to assist you in reaching the valley of the Drahkin, who harness the power of the dragon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirextX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Windows 10 Requires 6GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
